About Me

My name is Oluwasegun Oreoluwa Adejuwon

I lead a team of enthusiastic and energetic creatives, dedicated to steering clients to success when they are at the crossroads of challenge and change through sound strategy, qualified process, collaborative approach and research - Zurnergy Media; a creative design team in Nigeria.

I am a creative and hardworking designer. I stand out and represent the gospel of good branding and how it adds values to businesses/products.

I have successfully engaged and delivered design tasks and projects over the last 7 years either on a freelance, part-time and full-time based.

I am an excellent communicator, fast learner, time manager, and quick in grasping the bigger picture. A unique example of a great personality, born leader, goal getter and team player.

Education

I am an undergraduate student of Food Engineering, Food Science and Technology, Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife, Osun State, Nigeria.
